body:
Enhanced the UX of the Issues Calendar View by adding accessible tooltips to navigation buttons and issue items, replacing the native `title` attribute. Also fixed a minor visual bug in the Command Palette component. Verified with new unit tests.
ğŸ’¡ **What:** Added tooltips to calendar navigation and issues.
ğŸ¯ **Why:** To improve accessibility and provide clearer feedback to users. Native `title` attributes are often inaccessible to keyboard users and screen readers.
ğŸ“¸ **Before/After:** (No visual screenshot provided, but interaction is improved via tooltips)
â™¿ **Accessibility:** Replaced inaccessible `title` attribute with Radix UI Tooltip; added tooltips to icon-only buttons.

---

## Summary by CodeRabbit

## Release Notes

* **Style**
  * Simplified the visual feedback for selected items in the command palette.

* **New Features**
  * Enhanced the calendar view with tooltips that appear on hover, providing issue titles and navigation guidance for calendar controls.
